name: StructureModifiers.AddSpawnsStructureModifier
description: Stock structure modifier that adds a mob spawn override to a structure. If a structure has mob spawn overrides, random mob spawning will use the structure's spawns instead of the local biome's spawns. Has the following json format: { "type": "neoforge:add_spawns", // Required "structures": "#namespace:structure_tag", // Accepts a structure id, [list of structure ids], or #namespace:structure_tag "spawners": { "type": "namespace:entity_type", // Type of mob to spawn "weight": 100, // int, spawn weighting "minCount": 1, // int, minimum pack size "maxCount": 4, // int, maximum pack size } } Optionally accepts a list of spawner objects instead of a single spawner: { "type": "neoforge:add_spawns", // Required "structure": "#namespace:structure_tag", // Accepts a structure id, [list of structure ids], or #namespace:structure_tag "spawners": [ { "type": "namespace:entity_type", // Type of mob to spawn "weight": 100, // int, spawn weighting "minCount": 1, // int, minimum pack size "maxCount": 4, // int, maximum pack size }, { // additional spawner object } ] }

fields.name: structures
fields.description: The field for the structures record component.

fields.name: spawners
fields.description: The field for the spawners record component.

constructors.name: AddSpawnsStructureModifier
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a AddSpawnsStructureModifier record class.

methods.name: singleSpawn
methods.description: Convenience method for using a single MobSpawnSettings.SpawnerData .

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) .

methods.name: structures
methods.description: Returns the value of the structures record component.

methods.name: spawners
methods.description: Returns the value of the spawners record component.
